ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] I never thought I'd see the day!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Congrats! If you have Luclin I suggest you get some friends (especially ones with vs undead spells) and head to Umbral Planes to hunt for Elysian Armor. I
ygData.messageBody:
Congrats!
If you have Luclin I suggest you get some friends (especially ones with vs
undead spells) and head to Umbral Planes to hunt for Elysian Armor. I
brought my mother's lvl 41 druid to sit invis on the sidelines while my 56
cleric and a 52 druid soloed the elysian mobs. She snared and dotted them
and kited them until I rooted them and used my undead dots. I was doing
190dmg every 6 seconds with my dots. They do have alot of HP though. and
they hit pretty hard. The arms dropped twice and so did the tunic. So both
druids got arms and tunic. It was fun!
luv,
-Su


But my druid has finally dinged level 50!!! WOOT!!!! *MAD CELEBRATION*

Man, it's been a long time coming! If I feel this ecstatic about level 50
think how I'm gonna be at 65! by the time I hti that they'll have raised
the level cap to 70!

I just recently purchased LDON but my cable modem got disconnected so I
could not play for like 2 months. I moved to a new place and got cable
modem reconnected and finally had my first adventure tonight!! I did the
Collect 28 Mummy Wrappings in Mistmore, and also the Kill 60 in Mistmore.
Successful on both and dinged 50 to boot!!

Time to start working on my epic I guess!

Raido Covenfall
50 ELF DRU
Cazic Thule Server


aka Wulfric Rennison
